cause.description:
CONTACT OFFICERS/DIRECTORS Corporate Officers Board of Directors Glen A. Bodzy General Counsel and Secretary glen.bodzy@urbanout.com Richard A. Scott A. Belair (1)(2) Principal, The ZAC Group scott.belair@urbanout.com Harry S. Cherken, Jr. Partner, Drinker Biddle & Reath LLP harry.cherken@urbanout.com Richard A. Hayne Chairman of the Board richard.hayne@urbanout.com Joel S. Lawson III (1)(2) Executive Director, M&A International Inc. joel.lawson@urbanout.com Robert H. Strouse (1) Chief Operating Officer, The AMC Group robert.strouse@urbanout.com (1)Members of the Audit Committee (2)Members of the Compensation Committee
or contact us at: Urban Outfitters, Inc.
You can contact Mr. Haynes at
Urban Outfitters, Inc. 5000 South Broad St Philadelphia, PA 19112-1495
OR (probably more effective) Tel: 215-454-5500 and get his mailbox by typing in Haynes and then pressing 2 for "Dick Haynes" 5000 South Broad St Philadelphia, PA 19112-1495 Tel: 215-454-5500
1. Position #1
cause.mission: Pressure Urban Outfitters to stop deceiving their public
cause.name: Urban Outfitters - What's their real message?
